ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
ygData.msgSnippet: I know I m late responding, I had that a couple times and it was a sign that EQ had crashed on me. I had alot of problems with my Voodoo 3. The screen would
ygData.messageBody:
I know I'm late responding, I had that a couple times and it was a sign that
EQ had crashed on me. I had alot of problems with my Voodoo 3. The screen
would just freeze up during EQ at random. It also did the same if I tried to
run a screen saver. I put the voodoo 3 in another computer and it did the
same freezing thing in EQ. I spoke to 3dfx and they said it sounded like a
defective card. Verant tech support agreed. They recommend you get the
drivers 1.07.00 from the 3dfx website in downloads section.
luv,
-Su

> Another difficulty I've been having is that when I die (unfortunately too
> often) and return to my binded home point. My screen is partial blackened
> out and flashes in and out for about 2 minutes until finally the whole
> screen is visible. Generally I can only see what my mouse pointer passes
> over during this time. Unless I meditate or loot something -- then I can
> see everything. I have a Voodoo 3 and haven't had this problem until a
> couple weeks ago. Has anyone else had this problem and know a solution?
>
> Keith
> -----Original Message-----
> From: LAINE. Mikael (Nol) [mailto:laine@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 31, 2001 2:15 AM
> To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
>
>
> This is a common problem, more and more have started to zone crash every
> second time the zone. I know VI is looking into this.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: The Mad Macinchaote [SMTP:scendera@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 5:20 PM
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
> >
> > Odd...mine started after a patch, went on til I raised cain about it,
> then
> > was fixed after a GM said it would be. No sound card changes on either
> > side and it's worked fine since. The card in question is an AWE64 gold
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Nygaard, Jeff <mailto:jnygaard@...>
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com <mailto:EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 9:39 AM
> > Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
> >
> > I would bet this crashing when she zones is a sound card
problem.
> I
> > would
> > suggest disable the sound card, start eq and try zoning. If she
> > zones fine
> > and does not crash, she'll need to buy a better sound card. I
had
> > the same
> > problem, switched sound cards and it was solved.
> >
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: John_Miewald@...
> > <mailto:John_Miewald@...>
> > [SMTP:John_Miewald@...]
> > Sent: Friday, May 25, 2001 11:12 AM
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: [EverQuest] Problem Signing On/Staying On
> >
> >
> > I have a friend who is having an unusually difficult time
> > signing on
> > and
> > staying online. It seems that just about any time she
> zones,

> >
> > Is this a common problem? Does anyone have some "quick
fix"
> > ideas
> > that
> > might keep her from being punted so easily?
> >
> > Thanks for any help.
> >
